name: SHAMA ANJUM
title: Java Software Engineer | Full Stack Web Developer

Career Summary.item1: Four years of software development experience in Java/J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Web Services with Agile (Scrum) methodologies and domain expertise in Banking and Financial Services
Career Summary.item2: Expertise in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
Career Summary.item3: Built web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React JS, Node.js).
Career Summary.item4: Self-motivated, quick learner and very passionate to learn modern technologies and tools.
